verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: accused] [ARG1: prosecutors working on the investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election] [ARG2: of planning to meddle in this year 's midterm elections] , [ARGM-ADV: while offering no evidence to back up his assertion] .

President Trump accused [ARG0: prosecutors] [V: working] [ARG1: on the investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election] of planning to meddle in this year 's midterm elections , while offering no evidence to back up his assertion .

President Trump accused [ARG0: prosecutors working on the investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election] of planning to [V: meddle] [ARG1: in this year 's midterm elections] , while offering no evidence to back up his assertion .

[ARG0: President Trump] accused prosecutors working on the investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election of planning to meddle in this year 's midterm elections , while [V: offering] [ARG1: no evidence to back up his assertion] .

President Trump accused prosecutors working on the investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election of planning to meddle in this year 's midterm elections , while offering [ARG0: no evidence] to [V: back] up [ARG1: his assertion] .
